Articles.Content:
Modders Diary is a place where you can share your mod ideas and ask for help, also you can put up links to your mods here snd development suggestions.

As for me, i am working on a Rc mod or ksp!

Edited November 28, 2017 by Jeb-head-mug kerman
The idea(s) you just described are largely the whole purpose of this Addond discussion subforum, but I like you unique ideas of a round table (chat group) and an open journal.
